attributes.action: confirm that criminal charges will be brought against MP's who have sought to profit from expenses claims.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The flagrant disregard for the taxpayer shown by our MPs is a disgrace. Those who have sought to utilise the expenses system to personally profit from our money should be treated as the common criminals that they are.

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
